title: defence for the win
body: sometimes defending the base is the only way, defend and hope for the ace and buy elixir of ruin and push maybe grab a baron at that point if your team is still alive.  If your base is over run with no turret defense always leave 1-2 players defending and hold off the enemy for a bit, at this point all the pushing power available is necessary to hold off for the ace, without it all hope is lost. but you can win with defense just need need team work.{{item:3050}}

replies.body: Yeah but you have to have a PhD is Psychology to deal with the amount of crying/whinging and failed FF's people throw out in order to win with an open base.
